item.title: Reading YouTube rather than watching it
item.description: It all starts with youtube-dl youtube-dl is a YouTube video downloader. You can install it with sudo pip install youtube-dl. Let’s make some scripts Use the spaCy NLP library to semantically segregate sentences. Segment-sentences #!/usr/bin/env python3.5 #!/usr/bin/env python3.6 # -*- coding: utf-8 -*- # python3.6 -m spacy download en import sys import spacy text = sys.stdin.read() nlp = spacy.load("en") doc = nlp(str(text)) for span in doc.sents: print(str(span)) clean-subs This script helps to make the subtitles very easy to read.
